meanings.sent1: The caterpillar evolutes into a butterfly over time.
meanings.sent2: Plants evolutes from seeds into beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The story evolutes into a hilarious comedy by the end.
meanings.sent4: Her skills evolutes like a blooming flower, becoming more refined each day.
meanings.sent5: The cityscape evolutes with each new building, changing its appearance constantly.

meanings.definition: A thing that has evolved from something else
meanings.sent1: The smartphone is an evolutes of the old rotary phone.
meanings.sent2: Birds are considered evolutes of dinosaurs in evolutionary theory.
meanings.sent3: The antique chair is an evolutes of a tree, transformed into furniture.
meanings.sent4: Her success is an evolutes of hard work and dedication, growing from humble beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The modern car is an evolutes of the first horseless carriage, revolutionizing transportation.
